Notes

This was my 1st video taping of The Smashing Pumpkins. A lot of excitement fills my body when i watch this video. Part of United States is missing from dcbullet recording. My audio is not

listen able. Thanks to diablovista (offor the filler. I feel there is a ever slight out of sync @ Tarantula / Starz but that is fixed by Zero and the remainder of the DVD.

Highlights: This show is pretty avg. The big highlight is Billy messing up Doomsday Clock.

A HD 1080i BLU-RAY version currently not available for public circulation but does exist.
